name: Destiny Dinosaur Dawn (DEMO)
description:
A bird and lizard dating sim / visual novel / text adventure / murder mystery game. In this demo you can date two out of the 4 available dates. Murder Mystery gameplay not yet available. There are people in this game.

Controls: Mouse space = Fast Forward Esc = Options Menu (You can change the text speed)

TN Programming Art (except title screen) Music

Liz the lizard Title Screen Art

ElegantGiraffeFantasy# Music
